column4: hea i got a question can anyone help me please. I am trying to download stuff off of the add/remove software and no matter what i try to download it gives me this message: E: dpkg was interrupted, you must manually run 'dpkg --configure -a' to correct the problem.
E: _cache->open() failed, please report.              i am connected to the Internet. I don't know what to do, can someone please help?!
you would need to run the suggested command, have you done that yet?
